entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 March 2023
